text: I think this is the worst pizza hut buffet I've been to yet. There wasn't a lot of people but they were constantly running out of plates and PIZZA at the pizza bar. Again, there wasn't a lot of people, but they constantly ran out of pizza …More

text: So we went to get pizza and they had a special on the window for 10 dollar pizza. Charged us 16.00 for the pizza cause WE DIDN'T ASK FOR THE 10 DOLLAR DEAL! Said okay asking now and she got attitude!

text: Called in a carry out order to pick up on the way to motel from work. Get there and I hear the manager on duty (Nikki) say they need to remake a pizza, turns out it's mine. Then tries to get me to just take the one they messed up cooking, …More

name: Nathan Reaves
text: Nasty old tasting pizza. Ridiculous how the extra cheese I ordered wasn't on there and was hard and old tasting. Employees on cell phones not working, thin pizza I order had no sauce on it, " maybe it DID just was old af ". Use to be a good place to eat but now it's ran down and not worth it.

name: Daniel Newswanger
text: My five stars go for excellent carry out service and good hot food. My order is always correct and I usually can get what I order. Only once or twice were they sold out of the wings I wanted. I can't give a fair rating on dining in as I rarely eat here.

name: Patrice Wade
text: Pizza is good. This is my hometown so I’ve patronized this place for most of my life. Word to the wise... I’m in the parking lot across from Days Inn & I witnessed a delivery at Days Inn. For safety reasons, please make sure your delivery …More

name: Telese Huffman
text: Ordered online so food would be ready to go and on time for our company's lunch break.   Food was not ready and our 3 orders of cheesesticks were left uncut.  Lunch went poorly due to these holdups. Guy at the drive-thru was obviously on the phone wirelessly and I couldn't tell when he was speaking to me or to the person on the phone.
